TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit TransactionInterop extends System.Object
public ref class TransactionInterop abstract sealed

summary.span: 促进 和以前编写的用于与 MSDTC、COM+ 或 进行交互的组件之间的交互。

span.span: Facilitates interaction between and components that were previously written to interact with MSDTC, COM+, or .
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类提供用于事务传播方法。This class provides methods for transaction propagation. 此过程的工作原理的详细信息，请参阅[事务传播](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/cossdk/html/b09541e6-4baf-4e37-b879-62884fbb0969.asp)。For more information on how this process works, see [Transaction Propagation](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/cossdk/html/b09541e6-4baf-4e37-b879-62884fbb0969.asp). 使用此类提供的方法，你可以进行两种类型的事务传播，导出/导入 （推送模型） 和传输器/接收器 （拉模型）。Using the methods provided by this class, you can engage in two types of transaction propagations, Export/Import (push model) and Transmitter/Receiver (pull model). 导出/导入 （推送模型） 传播涉及以下步骤，The Export/Import (push model) propagation involves these steps, 1. 在远程计算机上的"行踪"该计算机的事务管理器通过调用获取方法。On the remote machine, obtain the "whereabouts" of the transaction manager of that machine by calling the method. 然后可以缓存这条供将来使用客户端计算机上的信息。You can then cache this piece of information on the client machine for future usage. 2. 发送包含行踪使用任何喜欢的方法在客户端计算机的数据Send the data containing the whereabouts to the client machine using any preferred method 3. 在客户端计算机上使用行踪事务"导出"到远程计算机和生成的事务"cookie"。On the client machine, use the whereabouts to "export" the transaction to the remote machine and generate a transaction "cookie". 这是通过调用并传递在远程计算机的行踪。This is done by calling and passing in the remote machine's whereabouts. 4. 将"cookie"包含事务的数据发送到远程计算机使用任何喜欢的方法Send the data containing the transaction "cookie" to the remote machine using any preferred method 5. 在远程计算机上使用事务"cookie"通过调用获取客户端事务的克隆方法。On the remote machine, use the transaction "cookie" to obtain a clone of the client transaction by calling the method. 6. 在远程计算机上使用克隆事务登记使用资源管理器或方法的类。On the remote machine, use the clone transaction to enlist the resource manager using the or methods of the class. 传输器/接收器 （拉模型） 传播涉及以下步骤，The Transmitter/Receiver (pull model) propagation involves these steps, - 在客户端计算机中，使用事务生成相应的"传播标记"通过调用 On the client machine, using the transaction generates a corresponding "propagation token" by calling - 包含在事务中的"传播标记"，到远程计算机使用任何喜欢的方法将数据发送Send the data containing the "propagation token" of the transaction to the remote machine using any preferred method - 在远程计算机上使用"传播标记"以通过调用获取客户端事务的克隆 On the remote machine, use the "propagation token" to obtain a clone of the client transaction by calling 传输器/接收器模型提供了在事务令牌发送到远程计算机，但在远程计算机可能会使用它来获取事务方案中更好的性能。The Transmitter/Receiver model provides better performance in scenarios where the transaction token is sent to a remote machine, but the remote machine may not use it to obtain the transaction. 这是因为该事务不会传播直到调用。This is because the transaction is not propagated until is called. 另一个优点是传播标记可以发送到任何远程计算机中，尽管可以仅提供行踪在计算机上使用的导出 cookie。Another advantage is that the propagation token can be sent to any remote machine, while the export cookie can be used only on the machine that provided the whereabouts. 但是，还应注意行踪远程事务管理器封装在所有传播令牌，使其大于导出/导入模型中的相应事务 cookie。However, you should also note that the whereabouts of remote transaction managers are encapsulated in all the propagation tokens, making them bigger than the corresponding transaction cookies from the Export/Import model. **请注意**这种类型使用若要阻止该调用来自不受信任的代码; 但是，只有直接调用方需要拥有`FullTrust`权限集。**Note** This type uses to prevent it from being called from untrusted code; however, only the immediate caller is required to possess the `FullTrust` permission set.

summary.span: 将事务对象转换为导出事务 Cookie。

span.span: Transforms a transaction object into an export transaction cookie.

returns.span: 表示指定的 对象的导出事务 Cookie。

span.span: An export transaction cookie representing the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你想要将某个事务导出，调用此方法。Call this method if you want to export a transaction. `transaction`传递以及封送到事务 cookie。The `transaction` that is passed along is marshaled into a transaction cookie. 然后可以将事务 cookie 发送到目标进程。You can then send the transaction cookie to the destination process. 这称为传播进程或系统之间的事务。This is referred to as propagating the transaction between processes or systems. 传播被视为本地事务到目标的推送位置的推送模型。The propagation is considered to be a push model where the local transaction is pushed to the destination. 因此，信息包含在`whereabouts`必须描述目标事务管理器。Therefore, information contained in `whereabouts` must describe the destination transaction manager. 有关不同传播模型的更多信息，请参阅 类的“备注”部分。For more information on different propagation models, see the Remarks section of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `transactionNative`与非托管形式兼容[ITransaction](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/cossdk/html/d40264be-f9b2-4044-aac6-84b43e5be666.asp) MSDTC 使用的托管形式的由。The `transactionNative` is compatible with the unmanaged form of [ITransaction](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/cossdk/html/d40264be-f9b2-4044-aac6-84b43e5be666.asp) used by MSDTC and with the Managed form of used by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法一起使用方法，提供了用于"请求"传播，在其中事务"拉取"从远程计算机时调用此方法来拆收事务功能。This method, together with the method, provide functionality for "pull" propagation, in which the transaction is "pulled" from the remote machine when this method is called to unmarshal the transaction. 有关不同传播模型的更多信息，请参阅 类的“备注”部分。For more information on different propagation models, see the Remarks section of the class.

exception.span: 事务的反序列化因无法联系事务管理器而失败。

span.span: The deserialization of a transaction fails because the transaction manager cannot be contacted.

exception.span: 这可能是由网络防火墙或安全设置导致的。

span.span: This may be caused by network firewall or security settings.

param.span: 要封送处理到传播标记中的事务。

summary.span: 为指定的 生成传播标记。

span.span: Generates a propagation token for the specified .

returns.span: 此方法与 方法一起提供了用于“传输器/接收器”传播的功能，在该传播中，如果调用后者来拆收事务，则会从远程计算机“拉取”事务。

span.span: This method, together with the method, provide functionality for Transmitter/Receiver propagation, in which the transaction is "pulled" from the remote machine when the latter is called to unmarshal the transaction.

returns.span: 有关不同传播模型的详细信息，请参阅 类。

span.span: For more information on different propagation models, see class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig unsigned int8[] GetWhereabouts() cil managed
Public Shared Function GetWhereabouts () As Byte()

summary.span: 获取 使用的分布式事务管理器的“行踪”。

span.span: Gets the Whereabouts of the distributed transaction manager that uses.

returns.span: 使用的分布式事务管理器的“行踪”。

span.span: The Whereabouts of the distributed transaction manager that uses.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 行踪包含描述事务管理器的位置的地址。The Whereabouts contains an address that describes the location of a transaction manager. 这允许两个事务管理器相互通信，从而将事务从一个系统传播到另一个系统。This permits two transaction managers to communicate with one another and thereby propagate a transaction from one system to the other. 此方法返回的信息可以用于提供位置信息，使用推送模型事务传播方法。The information returned by this method can be used to provide location information for push model transaction propagation with the method. 有关不同传播模型的更多信息，请参阅 类的“备注”部分。For more information on different propagation models, see the Remarks section of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid PromoterTypeDtc
Public Shared ReadOnly PromoterTypeDtc As Guid

summary.span: 分布式事务处理器的类型。

span.span: The type of the distributed transaction processor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值用于`Transaction.PromoterType`属性，如果事务或将被提升到 MSDTC 和`Transaction.GetPromotedToken`方法将返回的 MSDTC 事务传播令牌`byte[]`结果。This value is used for the `Transaction.PromoterType` property if the transaction is or will be promoted to MSDTC and the `Transaction.GetPromotedToken` method will return an MSDTC transaction propagation token for the `byte[]` result.
